description:
11.232 showpalette
Displays the 256 colors palette of each frame. This filter is only relevant for
pal8 pixel format frames.

It accepts the following option:

s.description: Set the size of the box used to represent one palette color entry.

name: showpalette

parameters.description: Set the size of the box used to represent one palette color entry. Default is 30 (for a 30x30 pixel box).
parameters.name: s

source:
11.232 showpalette

Displays the 256 colors palette of each frame. This filter is only relevant for pal8 pixel format frames.

It accepts the following option:

s

Set the size of the box used to represent one palette color entry. Default is 30 (for a 30x30 pixel box).
